para.span: 当从 派生并向派生类添加新属性时，请确保重写 方法，以便在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

para.span: 还应调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据 控件的 属性的值，此方法由控件的 方法调用，以检索表示该单元格的剪贴板格式值。Depending on the value of the property of the control, this method is called by the control's method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell. 此方法的位置相关参数指示此单元格位于表示由 控件中的选定单元格定义的区域的数据表中。The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the control. 除了单元格值外，此方法还可能会返回格式设置信息，具体取决于单元格的位置。Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value. 例如，行第一列中的单元格的 HTML 格式将包括指示行的开头的标记。For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row. 支持的剪贴板格式包括 、、和 。The supported clipboard formats include , , , and . 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information, see the class.

span.span: is not -1.
